thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 11 of 141
thread.title: Kristina

author: Kristina
title: Kristina
text:
I have been ordering from Mabel's Labels since 2010. Labels for the school year, camp and even gifts. The icon and colour choices are great.
My niece and nephew in the US love getting their labels for the new school year. My sister says there is nothing comparable available to her. I let my daughter pick out what she would like and it is usually a tough decision because she likes so many of the icons.
The only suggestion I have is to make address labels available all year long. I love the Christmas labels and miss them during the year. Maybe offer them in a few colours like white or clear with a house or mail box icon.
